scripts.review:sample: powershell -Command "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://127.0.0.1:8787/archivist/review' -Method POST -ContentType 'application/json; charset=utf-8' -Body (Get-Content -Raw .\sample_requests\review_sample.json -Encoding UTF8) | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content"
scripts.promote:sample: powershell -Command "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://127.0.0.1:8787/archivist/review/promote_selected' -Method POST -ContentType 'application/json; charset=utf-8' -Body (Get-Content -Raw .\sample_requests\promote_selected_sample.json -Encoding UTF8) | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content"
scripts.promote:canon: powershell -Command "$body = '{ \"slugs\": [\"vaelthirathil\",\"moon-spire\"] }'; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://127.0.0.1:8787/archivist/promote' -Method POST -Headers @{ Authorization = 'Bearer dev' } -ContentType 'application/json' -Body $body | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content"
